message: Let's split the money almost evenly, Bob, but I get a little extra to start.  It's only fair since I have to make the first offer.
I think I deserve a bit more since you got to make the first offer and I had to reject it. Plus, the money is already losing value!
Bob, let's be reasonable. It's clear we both want a share. I'm proposing an even split to avoid further losses due to inflation.
